This combination allows two variants: H$ and #H. From the surface tones, there is no way to tell which one is illustrated by this token, since both H$ and #H yield a surface-phonological M.M+H string when the copula is added.

This combination allows three variants: MH#, H# and H$. The present token may be a realization of either MH# or H$, since both yield a M.M+H pattern in association with the copula.
